items.title: Taiwan's industry giants unite to tackle humanoid robot power crisis
items.summary: Taiwan's industry giants form an AI and robotics alliance to address humanoid robot power crisis and accelerate development in the country.

items.title: Intel Confirms Nova Lake To Close The High-End Desktop CPU Gap With AMD In Late 2026, Bringing SMT Back To P-Cores With “Coral Rapids” On Servers By 2028-2029, Highlights Need To Consolidate On Xe GPUs, & 55% Server Share
items.summary: Intel's upcoming Nova Lake and Coral Rapids CPUs aim to close the high-end desktop CPU gap with AMD, bring SMT back to P-Cores on servers, and consolidate on Xe GPUs. Intel's CEO highlighted the need for these advancements during the recent earnings call.

items.title: OptimizeRx Corp. (NASDAQ:OPRX) Receives $10.81 Average PT from Analysts
items.summary: OptimizeRx Corp. (NASDAQ:OPRX) has received a $10.81 average price target from analysts, with a consensus rating of 'Moderate Buy'. Three investment analysts have rated the stock with a hold rating.

items.title: iOS 26 beta preview: Liquid Glass is better than you think
items.summary: iOS 26 beta preview: Liquid Glass is better than you think - At WWDC 2025, Apple revealed a major visual shake-up for iOS (not to mention the rest of the company’s operating systems). This is the biggest change, aesthetically, since the shift away from the stitching, textures and skeuomorphic design of the iOS 4.

items.title: Recommendations for future AI growth: from exponential to linear, with economic anchors
items.summary: Recommendations for future AI growth suggest a shift from exponential to linear progress with economic anchors.

items.title: 【悲報】AI動画がもう本物と見分けがつかない模様ｗｗｗｗｗｗｗｗｗｗｗ
items.summary: AI-generated videos are becoming so realistic that it is difficult to distinguish them from real videos. This advancement in AI technology raises concerns about the potential misuse or manipulation of such videos in various applications.

items.title: Who is Phoebe Gates' boyfriend, Arthur Donald? Grandson of legend Paul McCartney; his net worth revealed
items.summary: Phoebe Gates, daughter of Bill Gates, is in a relationship with Arthur Donald, grandson of Paul McCartney. Arthur works at Iconiq Capital and Phoebe co-founded Phia. The couple's relationship was made public in late 2023.

items.title: Trump once eyed Nvidia breakup; chip industry says Intel is the one that needs intervention
items.summary: Trump considered breaking up Nvidia to spur competition in AI chip sector, but later abandoned the idea after realizing Intel was the one that needed intervention according to chip industry experts.

items.title: Comcast’s cable spin-off Versant sets up inaugural board of directors
items.summary: Comcast's cable spin-off Versant has set up its inaugural board of directors, including prospective CEO Mark Lazarus and former Disney exec Rebecca Campbell.

items.title: PartCrafter : Transform 2D Images into Stunning 3D Models (Local Install Guide)
items.summary: PartCrafter allows users to transform 2D images into 3D models for 3D printing or digital design, eliminating the need for specialized skills and expensive software. The tool streamlines the process and opens up new possibilities for creating 3D models from simple images.

items.title: AR Rahman meets OpenAI’s Altman, Perplexity AI’s Arvind Srinivas for ‘Secret Mountain’ project
items.summary: A.R. Rahman met with OpenAI's Altman and Perplexity AI's Srinivas to discuss empowering Indian creators with AI for his 'Secret Mountain' project, a virtual band project with diverse musical characters.

items.title: Intel slides after CEO struggles to show turnaround on track
items.summary: Intel is experiencing difficulties in showing a successful turnaround, leading to a decrease in stock value. The company is also implementing layoffs worldwide.

items.summary: Asian shares retreat following gains in Alphabet and AI stocks on Wall Street, despite a sharp decline in Tesla shares.

items.summary: Napoli's transfer market is heating up with targets like Raheem Sterling, Federico Chiesa, and Jack Grealish. This marks an innovative approach by Napoli's sporting director Giovanni Manna to strengthen the team.

items.title: Seven in 10 Indian employees carrying at least one lifestyle-related health risk: Survey
items.summary: Seven in 10 Indian employees are found to have at least one lifestyle-related health risk, as highlighted in a new report by MediBuddy and CII. The report emphasizes the evolving healthcare and workplace wellness landscape in India, driven by rising medical costs and a digitally empowered workforce.

items.title: Stocks to Buy | Earnings, Sectors & Risks: Jigar Mistry’s Roadmap for the Next 6 Months
items.summary: Jigar Mistry highlights India's favorable macroeconomic landscape in an interview with ET Now, noting controlled inflation, fiscal deficit, and current account. He provides insights on stocks to buy for the next 6 months.

items.title: Where tech meets culture: 2025 Hainan Southeast Tech & Art Festival to launch July 25
items.summary: Lingshui, a coastal county in southern China's Hainan province, will host the 2025 Hainan Southeast Tech & Art Festival from July 25-27, focused on empowering art with technology and innovation leading the future.

items.summary: While Europe debates quantum cyber security policies, the UAE has implemented quantum-resistant algorithm requirements, offering crucial lessons for organisations preparing for the post-quantum era.

items.summary: Samsung launches new foldables and smartwatches with a big focus on AI, including Galaxy Z Fold7, Z Flip7, Z Flip7 FE, Galaxy Watch8, and Watch8 Classic.

items.title: Wi-Fi 8 detailed, even if it's years away: More stable connections, lower latency
items.summary: Wi-Fi 8, a new standard aiming to provide more stable connections and lower latency, is detailed in a blog post by Qualcomm. The technologies it offers could benefit AI, industrial automation, and advanced wearables.

items.summary: Tech companies like Alphabet, Meta, and Microsoft stand to benefit from Trump's AI action plan as he vows to cut red tape, following millions invested in the industry.

items.summary: With three months to go until Microsoft ends support for Windows 10, Dell and Intel want to convince corporate buyers that upgrading their PC fleet is a virtue and not a necessity.

items.title: Intel Earnings: Chipmaker to cut jobs as Q3 loss forecast deepens
items.summary: Intel plans to cut jobs in an effort to reduce its workforce to 75,000 by year-end, with shares jumping despite a projected steeper third-quarter loss. Sales are expected to surpass estimates, and CEO Lip-Bu Tan is leading a turnaround.

items.title: Intel beats shareholder lawsuit over $32 billion stock plunge
items.summary: Intel beats shareholder lawsuit over $32 billion stock plunge, as a federal judge dismisses claims of shareholder fraud related to issues in its foundry business.

items.title: Digital sovereignty becomes a matter of resilience for Europe
items.summary: Digital sovereignty in Europe is becoming a matter of resilience, with initiatives like Gaia-X and the EU AI Act driving the continent's technological future. The focus is shifting from regulation to building digital sovereignty.
